"In my universe, time travel is possible but only in a linear fashion. This means that once someone travels back in time, they cannot travel forward again until they return to their original point in time."
"In my universe, gravity is determined by the energy density of the matter present. The stronger the energy density, the greater the gravitational pull."
"In my universe, all living beings are connected through a shared consciousness. This connection allows individuals to communicate telepathically and share knowledge instantaneously."
"In my universe, there is a universal force that governs all matter. This force is invisible and can only be detected through its effects on matter."

"In my universe, every individual has a unique genetic code that determines their abilities and talents. This code can be manipulated to enhance or suppress certain traits, allowing for personalized evolution."
